Project.Brief history of your project and organi: DATA.GOV.HK is an online web interface provided by the Digital Policy Office of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (the “Government”) to the public for obtaining certain open data.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: DATA.GOV.HK is an online web interface provided by the Digital Policy Office of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (the “Government”) to the public for obtaining certain open data.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We are very familiar with the Filecoin network. We have developed software, have mature data processing capabilities, and have processed a lot of data.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, Europe, North America, South America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Cloud storage (i.e. S3), HTTP or FTP server, IPFS, Shipping hard drives, Lotus built-in data transfer
